content: I'm trying to follow the changes on the committer streams - but all I get is the actual changes in the source. I'm not involved enough in the process for that to give me any visibility to the process.
is there anyway to see what the changes are to the output spec? is there anyway to see the current latest version of the spec?

@Grahame Grieve - The latest version is at http://cds-hooks.org. Since we haven't done a 1.0, this page is our current build. Once we cut a 1.0 (or shortly before), I will be versioning it in the URL (similar to how FHIR does it)

Additionally, on each pull request there is a "View Deployment" button that will show you the spec with the pull request changes built in. That's a nice way for you to see each change while it is under review on the pull request (prior to getting merged to master)
